entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
